comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: The New York Beaux Arts Society presented a pageant of the history of Venice at the Hotel Astor, on February 20, 1914. New York Times story, February 21, 1914: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9D03E0DF163AE6... Other Bain/LOC photos from the Beaux Arts Society's Venetian Pageant: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4865583415/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4865582597/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4865583077/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4865583559/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4865583703/in/photostream/]
